column4: btw ctrl shift dragging a file/folder in nautilus will also create a symlink
you also want to be careful about symlinking a child folder of a protected parent folder...i don't think it inherits its permissions

yes, so parentFolder ( not publicly viewable) -> childFolder... (assumed to be private due to parent folder)
